InformativeText.Abstract: Hello Bluetooth service is based on the use case specified in the “Hello Bluetooth” profile. It exposes information(attendee's name and company name) to a collector.
InformativeText.Summary: This service exposes information (attendee’s name and company) . This Service is instantiated as a Primary Service and is mandatory. Only one instance of this Service is exposed.

Dependencies.Dependency: This service is not dependent upon any other services.

Characteristic.name: Attendee Name String
Characteristic.InformativeText: This characteristic represents the attendee's name.
